meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the zoonal behavior of the animals in the exhibit.

meanings.definition: A region characterized by a particular type of animal life.
meanings.sent1: The savanna is known for its diverse zoonal population of wildlife.
meanings.sent2: The zoonal of the rainforest includes various species of birds and mammals.
meanings.sent3: In the zoonal of the desert, camels are the kings of the land.
meanings.sent4: The zoonal of the ocean is a mysterious world full of unique creatures.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the zoonal of the Arctic revealed a stunning array of animals.
